Package org.codehaus.gmaven.adapter

GMaven adapter API.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ClassSource
    Configuration details for construction of a GroovyCodeSource instance.
    ClassSource.Inline  
    ClosureTarget
    Target implementation for a Closure.
    ConsoleWindow
    Provides the ability to open a Console window.
    ConsoleWindow.WindowHandle  
    GroovyRuntime
    Provides access to Groovy runtime components.
    ResourceLoader
    Provides named access to resources.
    ScriptExecutor
    Provides the ability to execute a Groovy script.
    ShellRunner
    Provides the ability to run a groovysh shell.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    MagicContext
    Magic context constants.
